    • Constructor Detail

      • JDBCDBConnection

        public JDBCDBConnection(java.lang.String driver,
                java.lang.String url,
                boolean prompt)
        Creates a new PCD SQL connection object.
        Parameters:
        driver - the class driver for the database
        url - the database URL to connect to
        prompt - whether to prompt for the username and password, if null

      • JDBCDBConnection

        public JDBCDBConnection(java.lang.String driver,
                java.lang.String url,
                java.lang.String user,
                java.lang.String password)
        Creates a new PCD SQL connection object.
        Parameters:
        driver - the class driver for the database
        url - the database URL to connect to
        user - the user to log into the database server with
        password - the password to log into the database server with

            throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the BioPCD representation of the PCD SQL command
        Parameters:
        scope - the level of scope to write the menu widget.
        out - the writer object to output the BioPCD code.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
